name: Grenade Deathmatch
description:
Grenade Deathmatch is a multiplayer game in which players are only equipped with bombs as their weapon in an isolated dry land. Players should do anything to be the lone survivor in this fast-paced royal rumble.

Players can create their own game lobby room and wait players to connect and then start their bomb duel. I am working by myself and this is just my first take on a android game.

The game is still actively developed and this is just the first stages of the game. I want to add depth and different bomb types as well as improvements in controls mechanically.
